Main Street Outbound

Description:

The Main Street Outbound leaves campus and travels through Main Street in Johnson City & Binghamton and the Pharmacy & Nursing Schools enroute to the University Downtown Center.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:15 A.M. to 10:00 P.M.


Weekends:
11:45 A.M. to 8:45 P.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Main Street Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

① Leaves the University Union

② Pharmacy School

③ Main St & Floral Av

④ Main & Murray Streets

⑤ Arrives at the University Downtown Center


M-T= Only operates Monday-Thursdays.

① ② ③ ④ ⑤

① Leaves the University Union

② Pharmacy School

③ Main St & Floral Av

④ Main & Murray Streets

⑤ Arrives at the University Downtown Center
